thread.title: GH Recap: Sam's escape plan is foiled when Liv gets the upper-hand

title: GH Recap: Sam's escape plan is foiled when Liv gets the upper-hand
text:
GH Recap: Sam's escape plan is foiled when Liv gets the upper-hand 
Violette DeSantis Wednesday, February 22nd, 2017 
Wednesday February 22, 2017: Desperation is sparked in Ava, consequences catch up to Julian, and Michael’s pushed away. Pin 
At Sonny’s, Carly leaves Nelle a message checking on progress at the cabin and hangs up when Sonny interrupts. Carly hints making plans for them, kisses Sonny and leaves to run errands. 
At the cabin, Nelle stops Michael when they almost kiss. After they’re dressed, Michael thinks that no matter what arrangement she has with her boyfriend, she doesn’t seem happy. Nelle admits keeping things close to the cuff to protect herself. Michael reminds her it also keeps away the people who care. Nelle’s sure that things aren’t going to work out as well for her as for someone like Michael who has a caring family. Since she was a little girl she’s always wanted someone to love her but she doesn’t deserve happiness. Michael thinks she does and hugs her. Nelle smiles as they sit, thinking she’s ready for a new path. Michael’s interested if he’s on that path. 
Spotlight on… Where are they now? Jenna Dewan Tatum co-hosting Jennifer Lopez’s World of Dance 
At GH, Jason and Monica find Sam’s prenatal appointment mix-up odd but are glad to catch up. Monica pulls out a blanket knitted by Lila for Jason when he was a baby. She leaves and Jason receives a call from Sonny to meet. In the conference room, Tracy’s hoovering over Hayden worrying if they can keep the hospital open when Monica walks in. Hayden replies, “Well ladies, I think we did it.” Monica’s ready to open the sparkling cider in her office but Tracy knows they must face the board first. Hayden laughs at the pressure of convincing some that a struggling hospital is better than condos. Tracy decides there’s reasonable certainty they’ll sway some votes and agree to celebrate their almost done deal. Hayden tries to call Finn but learns he’s cancelled his reservation and won’t make his meeting. 
New: Academy Awards host Jimmy Kimmel guest stars on Ellen this week 
Carly finds Bobbie sorting mail in her office. She laughs when Carly tells her where she’s taking Sonny for their romantic getaway and breaks the news about the weather. Carly reaches a caretaker who confirms Nelle made it. Bobbie pretends relief over Nelle being safe. Bobbie calls Felicia after Carly leaves and sounds worried by what she’s found. 
Sonny fixes Jason a drink when he arrives and asks if he thinks Julian has another sister. Jason thinks that, or that Olivia Jerome didn’t really die in 1990 when Julian shot her in the back. He certain that if she’s alive there’s a good chance she killed Morgan. Jason calls Spinelli and puts him on the case. Sonny asks what Jason will do if it’s Ava. Jason’s eager to get the right person. Carly arrives with a bottle of champagne as the two finish and Jason leaves. Sonny wonders what the surprise is and Carly pouts about there not being one. He doesn’t think they need a cabin as long as there’s the two of them. They kiss. 
New: Season two airdate announced for Hallmark's Chesapeake Shores 
On the road, Sam’s not sure where Liv’s discussion is leading but admits being familiar with symbols in the Chinese culture. She asks what reincarnation means to Liv. Liv fiddles with her cell phone while lying about her sobriety being her reincarnation. She inquires when Sam felt lost in her life. Sam anxiously confesses, “Now,” and then asks Liv to pull over. She does and Sam explains her friends are over the footbridge. After exiting the car Sam hurriedly tries to call Jason but drops her phone. Liz reaches her and kicks it away. She knows Sam realizes who she is and pulls a gun on her. 
Ava’s alone in her jail cell ranting at the guards who are ignoring her. She hopes Julian’s there to get her out when he arrives. He regrets not being able to help which angers Ava further until he mentions Alexis won’t help Ava until she doesn’t hear from him. Realizing he’s terrified, Ava offers to help, begging to know what’s going on. He’s about to tell her when he receives a message alert from Liv, it’s a blurry photo of Liv driving Sam somewhere. Julian clams up and Ava loses it. She’s done with him, he’s dead to her. He says, “You have no idea.”
